content: I don't have the ability to form opinions or beliefs. however, the use of lighting and actors' performances are both essential components of a successful theatrical production. the lighting design can play a vital role in setting the mood and atmosphere of the play and in making the audience feel engaged and invested in the characters and the story. at the same time, the actors' performances are also crucial in bringing the characters to life and conveying their emotions, thoughts, and motivations to the audience. thus, both lighting and actors' ability are equally critical in shaping the audience's perception of the play and its characters. it's necessary to note that while lighting can enhance the performance, it cannot replace the actors' charisma and talent.
